Producer: Darryl Porter, Vince Wilburn Jr., Daniel Wagner, Robert Ogden Barnum, Don Cheadle, Pamela Hirsch, Lenore Zerman
Production Co: IM Global, Sobini Films, Bifrost Pictures, Naked City Films, Sony Pictures Classics, Crescendo, Miles Davis Properties
Rating: R (Drug Use|Brief Violence|Some Sexuality/Nudity|Strong Language Throughout)
Synopsis: In the 1970s, down-and-out jazz trumpeter Miles Davis (Don Cheadle) tries to recover his new session tape from music producers.
Title: Miles Ahead
